name: Jay the Miner
overview: A game inspired by Manic Miner and named after (and dedicated to) the creator of the Amiga, this game was created using Backbone and released in 2015 by M. J. Nurney. Control Jay the miner as he jumps his way from level to level trying to collect the company bonds. Atari, CBM and Amiga bonds are scattered throughout the levels. Collect 5 on each to progress. In later levels Mitchy the dog will appear, take him back home by jumping on him to catch him. Secrets are included on some later levels to help you complete the areas. Extra live bonus awarded in later levels 5+.
